ingredients.item: 250g pouch Tilda Quinoa, Pumpkin & Sunflower Wholegrain Brown Basmati Rice, prepared according to pack instructions
1 ripe avocado halved, stoned and diced
2 tbsp pumpkin seeds or roughly chopped nuts

instructions.step: Put the rocket, grain mix and avocado in a large serving bowl. Add the lemon juice and oil and gently toss together.
Scatter over the seeds or nuts and top with the berries
